SYN_015_0_7:
[Indication]
Esophageal cancer with extrinsic airway compression and TE fistula.
[Anesthesia]
General Anesthesia (LMA converted to Rigid).
[Description]
Rigid bronchoscopy performed. Left mainstem tumor debulked using APC and mechanical forceps. Silicone Y-stent (14x10x10) deployed. Stent confirmed to cover fistula and patent airways.
[Plan]
Admit to PACU. CXR. Hypertonic saline nebulizers.
